screen_desc: The screenshot displays a search interface, likely from a mobile app, showing recent search results. The user is searching for "linkedin" and related topics such as the "LinkedIn app," "LinkedIn learning," and "LinkedIn ads." Other searches include job search and dating apps, such as "Indeed job search app" and "LinkedIn dating app." The interface shows a history of searches with icons to the right, likely for accessing or clearing the search results.
history_actions: click on the "Google Chrome" app located at the lower left.
click on the search icon (typically a magnifier) located at the top-right corner of the screen.
